    <metadata>

        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>eun</catalog>
            <entry>15301</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Bilder Quiz Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Pictures Quiz Europe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Jeu l'Europe d'Images</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quiz Europa Dos Retratos</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quiz Europa Delle Immagini</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαγωνισμός γνώσεων Ευρώπη εικόνων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Concurso Europa De los Cuadros</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Die Lernenden können hier testen, welche berühmten Plätze/Sehenswürdigkeiten in Europa sie schon kennen.</string>
            <string language="en">Which famous places/sights in Europe they already know, the students can test here.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Städte</string>
            <string language="en">Cities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Sehenswürdigkeiten</string>
            <string language="en">Sights</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Europa</string>
            <string language="en">Europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Quel places/sights célèbre en Europe ils savent
déjà, les étudiants peuvent tester ici.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Que places/sights famoso em Europa sabe já, os 
estudantes podem testar aqui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Quale places/sights famoso in Europa già 
conoscono, gli allievi possono esaminare qui.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ποιες διάσημες θέσεις/θέες στην Ευρώπη ξέρουν ήδη, 
οι σπουδαστές μπορούν να εξετάσουν εδώ.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Qué places/sights famoso en Europa él sabe ya, 
los estudiantes pueden probar aquí.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Villes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vues</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Europe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Cidades</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vistas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Europa</string>

          </keyword>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Europa</string>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ευρώπη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciudades</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vistas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Europa</string>
          </keyword>
